segmentA.details: VOXEL is the ecosystem of products that individually make our teams more efficient and more effective. Collectively, they drive the data and models that form the digital twin for our mines and systems. That digital twin allows us to explore and test the new technologies and innovations that will deliver FutureSmart Mining and the Burning Ambition.
segmentA.title: What is VOXEL?

segmentB.details: The applications that the VOXEL platform will deliver for you will change the way you work. You'll be able to work more efficiently, and add more value through generating better quality data. The Data and Digital Literacy Programme is being created to help you make the most of this change, and you can start right away.
segmentB.title: Prepare for change - Train
